description: This file exports a function 'callBackendGenerate' that interacts with a backend API endpoint '/api/generate'. It constructs the URL based on environment variables, performs a POST request with a prompt payload, and handles response errors, facilitating communication between the frontend and backend services in a ReactJS project.

methods.name: callBackendGenerate(prompt)
methods.description: Asynchronously calls the backend '/api/generate' endpoint with a prompt, returning the JSON response or throwing an error on failure.
